alert.note: Alert for Harris; Muscogee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:28PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Muscogee and southeastern Harris Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 528 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Fortson, or 8 miles northeast of Smiths, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Ellerslie, Flat Rock, Green Island Hills, Midland, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Fortson and Laurel Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
